channel.title: News: Two guys threaten a 13 year old guy with a knive for it's RuneScape Pass!
channel.description:
[tt]September 17, 2007[/tt]
It's really happened, was on the news today here in Holland. Two guys (14 and 15 years old) threaten a 13 year old guy with a knive for its RuneScape password! :eek:
What today's RuneScape players aren't doing to gain free accounts :eek:, it's just horrible, I am pretty scared of it, even too scared to play RuneScape. Maybe the same thing happends to me! You'll never know...
Is there ever happened something like that earlier? Discuss about it :)
[url=http://www.inc-nieuws.com/index.php?news=4342]PROOF THAT IT REALLY HAPPENED! (Dutch)[/url]

item.title: News: Two guys threaten a 13 year old guy with a knive for it's RuneScape Pass!
item.dc:creator: @Moparrsplaya Moparrsplaya
item.description:
@Moparrsplaya wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:6, topic:144332”][quote author=jason_x link=topic=197888.msg1764247#msg1764247 date=1190088239]
Ok um whats the point exactly?
IT’S A GAME!!!
That is not worth going to a juvinile building or prison over.
Also why?
[/quote]Obsession.[/quote]

Addition: Pixel hugger, Nerd, No life.

Read full topic

@system wrote:

Bobby:

thats not really true, but us law states that no oe can be on thses forums udner 18. ( i think cause its hosted in america)

Hmm, let’s have a look:

[b]Gender:[/b] Male [b]Age:[/b] [u]13[/u]

goodbye

ow almost forgot, I am 13 too…

…SO!?

man, people these days do a lot to get a runescape acount.
Someone also have been sticked by a knife because he hacked his friend (didn’t know if he survived)
It’s like… zombies? they need rs accounts or they will die themselves.

It’s kinda pathetic what they do these days to get something of runescape.
[/quote]

so true. they could be using that time to commit real times :P, so there is one benifit.[/quote]
you mean CRIMES?

item.title: News: Two guys threaten a 13 year old guy with a knive for it's RuneScape Pass!
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:34, topic:144332”][quote author=Zameix link=topic=197888.msg1765460#msg1765460 date=1190148870]

A few months ago (can be last year) a Dutch bloke committed suicide after his best friend hacked his RuneScape account.

Yeah, his name was marteen, he was a 14 year old regular runescape player. Nobody had a bad word to say about him. He was in a clan and he met many friends there.
His “Best Friend” (WHAT AN ASS) Took his 11m (somehow). And after that he posted a thread on runescape community and then as far as i know, hung himself.
[/quote]

I have a bad word to say about him. What a loser. I have no pity for a guy who kills himself over runescape.

Anyways at the news story, I lol’d kinda. I hope the kids get themselves stabbed.[/quote]
they’re going to get there asses kicked by people who have lives

Read full topic

A few months ago (can be last year) a Dutch bloke committed suicide after his best friend hacked his RuneScape account.
[/quote]

Yeah, his name was marteen, he was a 14 year old regular runescape player. Nobody had a bad word to say about him. He was in a clan and he met many friends there.
His “Best Friend” (WHAT AN ASS) Took his 11m (somehow). And after that he posted a thread on runescape community and then as far as i know, hung himself.[/quote]

I have a bad word to say about him. What a loser. I have no pity for a guy who kills himself over runescape.

Anyways at the news story, I lol’d kinda. I hope the kids get themselves stabbed.
